title: African Burial Ground National Monument: Photos & Multimedia
body: Photos & Multimedia         Renewal by Tomei Arai is located in the lobby of 290 Broadway, also known as the Ted Weiss Federal Building. General Services Administration  The African Burial Ground uses many forms of social media to share its story. Pictures and video of events held at our site, archival images of our site and its history, and tributes created by visitors can also be found on our Facebook page. In order to better tell the story of our site, the GSA created a series of artworks that are the focus of ranger led tours. To learn more about them, read this information on our Commemorative Artwork (PDF-262KB).    Â     Handmade ornaments representing nine national parks in the New York metropolitan area were prominently displayed on the official 2007 White House Christmas Tree. NPS - African Burial Ground National Monument; Charles Lilly, volunteer artist
